text: Aldo Aureggi (6 October 1931 â€“ 21 August 2020) was an Italian fencer. He won a silver medal in the team foil event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Rome. Aureggi died on 21 August 2020 in Rome, aged 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Italian fencers Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Aldo Aureggi
